text: is a district located in Nagano Prefecture, Japan. As of 2003, the district has an estimated population of 7,643 and a density of 24.96 persons per km2. The total area is 306.25 km2. ==Towns and villages== *Sakae ==Mergers== *On April 1, 2005 the village of Toyota merged into the city of Nakano. Category:Districts in Nagano Prefecture
title: Shimominochi District, Nagano
